name: SambaAds Solucoes Technologicas S.A.
description: Provider of a video distribution network platform intended to recommend videos for publishers and websites. The company's video distribution network platform includes media buyers access to video views on local (Brazilian) premium publishers in the form of standard and interactive formats, enabling users to produce videos and inke to any type of content produced.
one_liner: Provider of a video distribution network platform intended to recommend videos for publishers and websites. The company's video distribution network platform includes media buyers access to video views on local (Brazilian) premium publishers in the form of standard and interactive formats, enabling users to produce videos and inke to any type of content produced.
